entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
